author: From staff reports
title: Hill carries Russellville past East
text:
Hill carries Russellville past East From staff reports Enewscourier.com 
From staff reports 
Deyon Hill scored five touchdowns to lead Russellville in a 39-14 victory over East Limestone Friday at Tigers Stadium. Hill carried the ball 28 times for 233 yards and four touchdowns. He also had four catches for 68 yards and a score. 
East limited Hill to two short rushing touchdowns in the first half as Russellville took a 14-0 lead into the break. The Russellville playmaker gave his team a 21-0 lead midway through the third with a 26-yard run. 
East answered with a 63-yard touchdown connection from Zac Lacy to Easton Reece, but Hill made it 27-7 Tigers on a 23-yard touchdown reception from Peyton Nichols. 
Hill’s final touchdown put the game away in the fourth quarter on a 42-yard run. 
Andrew Ennis score East Limestone’s other touchdown on a 27-yard pass from Lacy. 
No. 8 Russellville (5-1, 4-0) is now in the driver seat for the 5A Region 8 title. East Limestone (4-2, 3-1) hosts Lawrence County (4-2, 3-1) on Friday. 
-Anthony Moran contributed to this report Sign Up / Sign In With your existing account from... {* loginWidget *}
